lg.l: Some declare their lives are lived
and others claim they really live
The variety of our skin tones
brown and pink and beige and purple,
I've sailed upon the seven seas
I've seen the wonders of the world
but I've not seen any two
and lovers think quite different thoughts
We love and lose in China,
and laugh and moan in Guinea,
are born and die in Maine.
but we are more alike, my friends,
We are more alike, my friends,
We are more alike, my friends,

div.div: Angelou, Maya. The Complete Collected Poems of Maya Angelou. New York: Random House, 1994. Print.Angelou, Maya. The Complete Collected Poems of Maya Angelou. New York: Random House, 1994. Print.
